title: LuCLI Lucee Server Configuration
description: Configuration file for LuCLI-managed Lucee server instances (lucee.json).

name.description: Human-friendly server name. Defaults to the project directory name when omitted.

version.description: Lucee engine version to use for this server instance.

host.description: Hostname to use when generating default URLs and (when https.enabled=true) the self-signed certificate SANs. Defaults to 'localhost' when omitted.

webroot.description: Path to the webroot for this server. Can be relative to the project directory.

enabled.description: Enable JMX monitoring for this server.

jvm.description: JVM options for the embedded Tomcat/Lucee server.

maxMemory.description: Maximum heap size for the JVM (e.g. '512m', '2g'). Must match ^[1-9]\d*(m|g)$ (e.g. '256m', '1g').

minMemory.description: Initial heap size for the JVM (e.g. '128m'). Must match ^[1-9]\d*(m|g)$ (e.g. '128m', '512m').

additionalArgs.description: Additional raw JVM arguments appended to CATALINA_OPTS.

routerFile.description: Central router file for handling all routes (e.g. 'index.cfm').

enabled.description: Whether the Lucee administrator is accessible.

password.description: Administrator password. SECURITY WARNING: Using plain text passwords is strongly discouraged. Use environment variable syntax like ${LUCEE_ADMIN_PASSWORD} or ${LUCEE_ADMIN_PASSWORD:-defaultValue} instead to avoid committing secrets to version control.

https.description: Optional HTTPS configuration. When enabled, LuCLI adds an HTTPS Tomcat connector and generates a per-server PKCS12 keystore under the server instance directory.

redirect.description: Redirect HTTP to HTTPS (defaults to true when https.enabled=true).

enableLucee.description: Enable Lucee CFML engine and servlet mappings. When false, Tomcat serves only static content (e.g. HTML/HTM).

enableREST.description: Enable Lucee REST servlet mappings. When false, REST endpoints are disabled. Requires 'enableLucee' to be true.

agents.description: Named Java agents that can be toggled per server start.

enabled.description: Whether this agent is enabled by default for this instance.

jvmArgs.description: JVM arguments that activate/configure this agent (e.g. -javaagent:...).

configurationFile.description: Path to an external CFConfig JSON file (base configuration). May be relative to the project directory or an absolute path. This is loaded first as the foundation; values are then merged with the inline 'configuration' object.

configuration.description: Inline Lucee CFConfig configuration that overrides/extends the base from 'configurationFile'. The final merged result is written to lucee-server/context/.CFConfig.json on server start. The structure should match Lucee's .CFConfig.json format.
